text:
e="preserve">Robert Alan Monkhouse OBE (June 1, 1928 – December 29, 2003) was a British writer, actor, comedian and presenter. He was born in Beckenham, Kent. He wrote and presented on radio. He acted in films and wrote and acted on television. He was a game show host and stand-up comedian.
Monkhouse died of prostate cancer in Bedford.
